EmailTemplate.name: Drip - Avaloq - August 15.Email 3 - Webinar on Testing Avaloq
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar on Testing Avaloq
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Decide for yourself if Tosca Testsuite for Avaloq testing is too good to be true.
Watch our webinar on Avaloq testing at LGT Group here! http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/successful-test-automation-for-avaloq-at-lgt/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=drip
LGT Group, one of the largest private banking and asset management groups in Europe, successfully leveraged Tosca Testsuite to optimize risk coverage and time to market in their Avaloq testing.
Learn how to:
Identify and manage risks in testing your customized Avaloq system
Manage your test data
Achieve high test automation rates
Click here to watch the webinar! http://www.tricentis.com/resource-assets/successful-test-automation-for-avaloq-at-lgt/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=drip
Best regards, The Tricentis Team
